description: Create your account on the matrimony site by providing basic information about yourself. Set up your profile and preferences to enhance matchmaking.
Explore profiles of potential matches based on your preferences. Utilize search filters to narrow down the options and find someone compatible.
Express your interest in someone by sending a notification. This allows the other person to know that you are interested in getting to know them better.
Once your interest is reciprocated, you can access more detailed information about the person's profile. Learn more about their background, preferences, and values.
Initiate conversations and plan meetups with your potential match. Building a connection through conversations is crucial before deciding to take the next step.
Once both parties feel a strong connection and compatibility, take the next step towards marriage. Discuss plans, meet families, and embark on the journey of a lifelong commitment.
